DOC.brief_summary: The aim study evaluate morphologic hemodynamic change calf perforators endovenous laser ablation saphenous vein .
DOC.brief_title: The Fate Of Calf Perforators After Endovenous Laser Ablation Of Saphenous Veins
DOC.criteria: Symptomatic patient undergo EVLA procedure saphenous vein insufficiency Patients history deep venous thrombosis ( DVT ) Previous varicose vein surgery injection sclerotherapy Patients without superficial venous incompetency
